[Incredible Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=332) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 137 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Animal Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=322)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow and develop. It becomes a [nimble or savage animal companion](/companions/animal-companions/advanced-options) (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.
